Name: [Ally] Penguinboo
Desc:
All squad members' <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color> increases by <color=#2BAD00>10%</color>.
Active Skill: Executes a series of graceful slashes with an ice blade, dealing <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color> and accumulating <color=#98EFF0>Ice Anomaly Buildup</color>.
Desc2: Small but functional, it's a great help to Proxies in the Hollows.
